text: Akum'busya (mmwe Muhammadi ﷺ) ya ukana ni juga. Jilani: “Mu yalakwemo mwana ulemwa wekulungwa kwisa soni (ine) yakamuchisya ku wandu, nambo ulemwa wakweo uwele wekulungwa nnope kupunda yakamuchisya yakweyo.” Soni niakum'busya kuti ana chichi chachatole? Jilani: “Chakupunda (pa yakulajila yenu).” Iyyoyopeyo niyakutiji Allah pakusalichisya kukwenu ma Aya (ga malamusi) kuti m'be waganisya
